messages.message:
Scale at Brightcove...

Hi Brian, 

I found your profile and wanted to reach out to you. Brightcove is revolutionizing the way video is experienced on every screen. We are looking for a Polyglot Software Engineer to add to our team. You would work on our next generation video ingestion and delivery product in Go(lang).

Please let me know if you have a few minutes to chat about your background and what's next for you to see if this connects.

Best regards,

Wes Page
Sr. Tech Recruiter
Brightcove
wpage@brightcove.com

Wes Page
Sr. Tech Recruiter
Brightcove
wpage@brightcove.com
Thank you for connecting! I only have time to talk to the hiring manager.
